Files Headings

charsRightIndex.js

Used by _.trim and _.trimRight to get the index of the last character of string that is not found in chars.

Params
string string The string to inspect.
chars string The characters to find. 
function charsRightIndex(string, chars) {
  var index = string.length;

  while (index-- && chars.indexOf(string.charAt(index)) > -1) {}
  return index;
}

module.exports = charsRightIndex;
